name: Missed Single Removal Limbs
script:
if string.findPattern(matches[1],"rebounds") then
   ak.limbs.blademaster.rebound = true
   ak.limbs.currentbreak.who[#ak.limbs.currentbreak.who] = ak.limbs.currentbreak.attacker[#ak.limbs.currentbreak.attacker]
elseif #ak.limbs.currentbreak.who > 0 then
   table.remove(ak.limbs.currentbreak.weapon, #ak.limbs.currentbreak.who)
   table.remove(ak.limbs.currentbreak.limb, #ak.limbs.currentbreak.who)
   table.remove(ak.limbs.currentbreak.attacker,#ak.limbs.currentbreak.who)
   if #ak.limbs.currentbreak.augment == #ak.limbs.currentbreak.who then
      table.remove(ak.limbs.currentbreak.augment,#ak.limbs.currentbreak.who)
   end
   table.remove(ak.limbs.currentbreak.who,#ak.limbs.currentbreak.who)
end
matches: ^([\w'\-]+) dodges nimbly out of the way\.$
^([\w'\-]+) quickly jumps back, avoiding the attack\.$
^([\w'\-]+) twists (his|her) body out of harm's way\.$
^A reflection of ([\w'\-]+) blinks out of existence.$
^([\w'\-]+) parries the attack with a deft manoeuvre.$
^([\w'\-]+) steps into the attack, grabs your arm, and throw
^A chaos orb intercepts the attack against (\+) and renders it harmless\.$
^([\w'\-]+) moves into your attack, knocking your blow aside before viciously countering with a strike to your head\.$
^The attack rebounds onto [\w'\-]+\!$
^The attack rebounds back onto [\w'\-]+\!$
You parry the attack with a deft manoeuvre.
^You move inside [\w'\-]+\'s guard\, deflecting (his|her) attack to one side with your forearm before countering with a swift blow to (his|her) temple\.$
The attack rebounds off your rebounding aura!
You twist your body out of harm's way.
^Cracks spider across the surface of the crimson shield surrounding ([\w'\-]+)\, before it abruptly winks out of existence\.$
^You step into the attack\, grab ([\w'\-]+) by the arm\, and throw [\w'\-]+ violently to the ground\.$
You miss.
One of your reflections has been destroyed! You have 0 left.
He misses.
She misses.
You quickly jump back, avoiding the attack.
^You lash out at ([\w'\-]+) with .*\, but miss\.$
^\w+\'s blow lands upon you but is robbed of much of its impact by \w+ flawed technique\.$
^Your blow strikes \w+ but is robbed of much of its impact by your faulty technique\.$
([\w'\-]+) lashes out with a clumsy blow at ([\w'\-]+)\, landing with far reduced force\.$
You fumble your strike, the attack going wide.
^(\w+) stumbles\, \w+ attack going wide\.$
You dodge nimbly out of the way.
